November 13, 2024

Adding A Side Menu To My Website & Building A Pricing Tool

Yesterday I finally got around to adding a side menu for mobile devices to my website.

After testing it and working out the bugs, it's up and functional; how it looks is a work in progress.

Building A Website Pricing Tool

Another projects I managed to get started on earlier was putting some code together for a pricing tool I've had in mind for a while now. I'm going to be hosting this little application on my website for anyone to use, especially for people interested in get an estimate on developing a website for their business/personal project.

After doing doing some research I was finally able to find the right combination of HTML and JavaScript that does exactly what I need. The code that I Frankensteined takes all the selected values from the inputs in an HTML form and with a little bit of JavaScript it surmises all the selected values and displays a total at the bottom at the click of a button website pricing tool.

Future Plans For This Tool I'm Building

While it is just a skeleton right now, in the near future I will be adding things like icons and animations to make it as interactive and engaging as possible.
